About.title: About NPTELPrep
About.description: NPTELPrep is a free platform to help students prepare for NPTEL courses with practice questions, study materials, and more.
About.missionText: To make quality education accessible to everyone by providing free resources for NPTEL courses.

FeatureAnnounce.title: New Language Support
FeatureAnnounce.description: We've added support for 23 languages, including many Indic languages! Choose your preferred language from the selector below.
